documents.document: @NVanDistrict - Not impressed with District crews who ploughed snow all over freshly shoveled sidewalks of 4600 block of Hoskins this am.
@vanessa_tweets - Love the off-the-shoulder top vid. Where would I find the three tops featured? Thanks!
@sunshinecoastca - Loved the Hidden Groves hike! Thanks for the tip. The kids had fun and it was the perfect length!
@sunshinecoastca Awesome! Thanks for the tips. Might try Sechelt Groves tomorrow.
@sunshinecoastca - Thanks! Might to Smuggler Cove tomorrow. Any other hikes (with kids) we shouldn't miss?

@TacoFinoCantina - No worries. Another day for sure!
@FlyOverCanada - Awesome! Thanks ... we had a great visit ... and earned a couple of stamps!
@TacoFinoCantina - Street Food Vancouver listed White Lightning as open today. Walked all the way up with a very disappointed 6 year old.
@FlyOverCanada - Can we use the Tourism Passport Challenge today (Monday)? Not technically a public holiday! Thx.
@northvanrec - Do any of the pools in NVan have lanes/times dedicated for water walking? Thanks!
Road to #mtseymour is VERY snowy and icy. Please take it easy and drive slowly. 2 cars in ditch on the way down.
@WestVanDistrict - Are the playgrounds at John Lawson or Ambleside ready for play yet?
